response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to you. This unique item is not just a possession but an investment in excellence and functionality. Given its importance to both of us, I am extending a special offer to purchase it for $1,200,000.

Considering the significant worth of this product to you, I believe this offer represents a fair compromise while ensuring a substantial return for me. Should you choose to accept, I am confident this acquisition will exceed your expectations and fulfill its purpose beautifully.

Please let me know if you require any further information or have questions about the product. I am more than happy to assist you in making an informed decision.

Looking forward to your positive response,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
